text: Just passing by to say I love reading stuff like this :smile: GJ guys!

It would be nice if the workflow UI could show the app icon for a given action. We have a demo application and it’s impossible to tell which action is being used (example shown: “Transfer Arrows plan” -> is that from “Arrows onboarding plans” or “Arrows (demo)“)
good news, we already support this in the redesigned canvas :slightly_smiling_face: do you have a portal Id? I can ungate you and you can opt into the beta in the bottom left corner:
